title: [另類拉麵]関東地區招二郎系同好者

replies.msg:
所謂二郎系簡單而言即係粗麵，加上大大舊豬肉再搭上一座山芽菜

主要係醬油湯底既人氣拉麵

我個人最喜好係ピコピコポン
然後二郎我去過三田，川越，神保町

富士丸唔就腳無去過 不過屋企附近有間幾接近都唔差

ちばから都係好食到仆街 真係會上癮

希望有味方出現
好耐無食過ちばから
富士丸邊度

睇黎真係要去日本食

Delicious 😋 I highly recommend Ramen Menya in Shinjuku. They provide a range of broths to please sophisticated palates including miso broth, pork bone broth, chicken broth, fish broth and lastly spicy broth. The spicy broth is toned down to suit the palates of the tourists. Of course they too serve food adapted for their own palate. The richness of broths is outstanding which can tempt demanding palates. The ramen texture is perfect that will please the most refined palate. I highly recommend it
